title: Credibility Questions Dog World Bank President at Climate Summit
description: David Malpass has faced continuing criticism from those who question his commitment to climate action as well as the bankâ€™s track record.

media:description: David Malpass, the president of the World Bank, addressing finance ministers from around the globe at the United Nations climate summit in Sharm el Sheikh, Egypt, on Wednesday.
